name: videodestroyer
description: absolutely destroy the quality of video files

scripts.build: pkg index.js --output ./dist/VideoDestroyer.exe -t node16-win --compress Brotli && pkg index.js --output ./dist/VideoDestroyer-MacOS -t node16-macos --compress Brotli && pkg index.js --output ./dist/VideoDestroyer-Linux -t node16-linux --compress Brotli

author: artifish
